entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is looking at a picture of his parents' wedding day.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: A person mentioned in the context of Black's past, implying he was working for Voldemort when the picture was taken.

entities.name: black
entities.description: The best man at Harry's parents' wedding, who is shown to be handsome and full of laughter in the old photograph.

relationships.description: Black was the best man at Harry's parents' wedding, as seen in the old photograph.
It is implied that Black was working for Voldemort when the picture was taken.
